Package com.microsoft.azure.management.eventhub

Interface EventHubAuthorizationRules

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasInner<com.microsoft.azure.management.eventhub.implementation.EventHubsInner>, HasManager<com.microsoft.azure.management.eventhub.implementation.EventHubManager>, SupportsCreating<EventHubAuthorizationRule.DefinitionStages.Blank>, SupportsDeletingById, SupportsGettingById<EventHubAuthorizationRule>

    @Beta(V1_7_0)
public interface EventHubAuthorizationRules
extends SupportsCreating<EventHubAuthorizationRule.DefinitionStages.Blank>, SupportsDeletingById, SupportsGettingById<EventHubAuthorizationRule>, HasInner<com.microsoft.azure.management.eventhub.implementation.EventHubsInner>, HasManager<com.microsoft.azure.management.eventhub.implementation.EventHubManager>
    Entry point to manage event hub authorization rules.
